title: Lowest Mortality Rates Among Youth
description: In 2023, Andorra reported the lowest number of deaths among youth aged 15-24, with only 1 death recorded in each age group.

title: Exceptional Infant and Child Survival Rates
description: Andorra achieved the lowest infant and under-five mortality rates in 2023, with just 1 death in each category, showcasing its excellent healthcare system.

title: Minimal Neonatal Mortality
description: In 2023, Andorra recorded only 1 neonatal death, highlighting its effective maternal and newborn care services.

title: Universal Access to Sanitation
description: By 2022, 100% of Andorra's population, both rural and urban, had access to safely managed sanitation services, setting a global benchmark.

title: High Proportion of Middle-Aged Women
description: In 2023, 9.21% of Andorra's female population was aged 45-49, indicating a significant demographic segment in this age group.
